last_episode_to_air.name: The Eternal Reckoning
last_episode_to_air.overview:
With the town suspended in the air, everyone rallies together to defeat Charles Lovely before it's too late.

Dusty plans a family reunion.

name: Paradise PD
overview: An eager young rookie joins the ragtag small-town police force led by his dad as they bumble, squabble and snort their way through a big drug case.

episodes.name: Welcome to Paradise
episodes.overview: At 18, Kevin Crawford finally gets a shot at joining the police force run by his dad, just as a new drug dubbed "argyle meth" hits the streets.

episodes.name: Ass on the Line
episodes.overview: Bullet finds fame and glory in an underground dogfighting ring, and Chief Crawford butts heads with his biggest rival on a maddening homicide case.

episodes.name: Black & Blue
episodes.overview: At Gina's insistence, Fitz starts carrying a gun -- and ignites a national media scandal. Shipped off to a nursing home, Hopson uncovers a conspiracy.

episodes.name: Karla
episodes.overview: When Kevin's mom buys him a sleek new talking police car, it's love at first sight. Bullet turns Dusty into a fried-chicken kingpin.

episodes.name: Dungeons & Dragnet
episodes.overview: When Preacher Paul ropes the cops into his war against a "satanic cult" of D&D players, Bullet makes a move on the preacher's virtuous daughter.

episodes.name: Meet the Jabowskis
episodes.overview: After finding a clue to her past, Gina sets out on a quest for revenge and bonds with her long-lost family -- leaving Paradise without a tough cop.

episodes.name: Police Academy
episodes.overview: While Kevin and his dad face off in the police academy Coptathalon, Bullet runs the station and Dusty helps Hopson take care of unfinished business.

episodes.name: Task Force
episodes.overview: The hunt for the argyle meth mastermind leads Kevin and his task force to the circus. A cash-strapped Dusty auctions off his virginity on the dark web.

episodes.name: Parent Trap
episodes.overview: Kevin's plan to reunite his family backfires in a big way. After seeing his DNA test results, Dusty vows to stop the town's Thanksgiving parade.

episodes.name: Christmas in Paradise
episodes.overview: As Dusty scrambles to get Paradise ready for a visit from Santa, Kevin races to root out the traitor on the force.

episodes.name: Paradise Found
episodes.overview: As tourists flock to the new, peaceful Paradise, Gina plots to bust Dusty out of prison, Kevin savors his hero status, and Karen plans an execution.

episodes.name: Big Ball Energy
episodes.overview: On Kevin Sucks Day, Fitz hunts down a new meth supplier, the chief discovers Karen's secret fetish, and Kevin vows to defy an embarrassing prediction.

episodes.name: Tucker Carlson Is a Huge D**k
episodes.overview: A rant by Tucker Carlson sparks a war of the sexes, leaving Paradise with two police forces. Fitz's new evil plan is thwarted by Gal-Qaeda.

episodes.name: Who Ate Wally's Waffles
episodes.overview: Dusty finds a long-lost sitcom star living in Paradise and sets out to reboot his career. The squad obsesses over Kevin's bathroom habits.

episodes.name: The Father, the Son and the Post-it Note
episodes.overview: With crime at an all-time high, Chief Crawford decides to steal the Kingpin case back from Agent Clappers. Fitz runs into major money trouble.

episodes.name: Flip the Vote
episodes.overview: Desperate to win reelection, Karen legalizes meth ‚Äî inspiring Fitz to run against her. The chief recruits Dobby for a mission. Bullet visits hell.

episodes.name: Paradise PD Meets Brickleberry
episodes.overview: Fleeing Paradise, the gang crosses over into Brickleberry National Park, just in time to help Ranger Woody and crew hunt for missing bear Malloy.

episodes.name: Operation DD
episodes.overview: After learning that Fitz isn't quite what he seems, the squad races to stop their real enemy ‚Äî and save Paradise from a nuclear disaster.

episodes.name: Fallout
episodes.overview: Three months after the deep-dish pizza nuclear explosion, Fitz finds out he married a dolphin, Rusty and Delbert conquer an island, and Randall develops an anal polyp that begins to take over his life and body.

episodes.name: Top Cops
episodes.overview: Paradise PD engineers arrests to win Top Cop. Meanwhile, Dusty extorts free doughnuts from the local doughnut shop, Kevin converts to Judaism, and Fritz takes on multiple new identities.

episodes.name: Ice Ice Babies
episodes.overview: Randall must prove to Karen that he's a good father by taking care of Hopson. Meanwhile, Delbert and Rusty open a carnival on the new island they conquered, Dusty goes to great lengths to attend the carnival, despite being confined to desk duty, and Bullet poses as a stuffed animal to get close to a sexy woman.

episodes.name: Trigger Warning
episodes.overview: Paradise's gun problem spirals out of control...and things get worse when smartguns are introduced. Meanwhile, Bullet becomes a viral video star and Fitz tries to rekindle his marriage.

episodes.name: Showdown at the O-bese Corral
episodes.overview: Dusty becomes the leader of a fat acceptance cult. Meanwhile, Gina confronts her masturbation addiction and Fitz's dolphin wife gets a job at SeaWorld.

episodes.name: How the Cookie Crumbles
episodes.overview: Randall stages a heist to get his sperm back from the sperm bank. Meanwhile, Fitz runs afoul of the mutants who remember him as "The Kingpin", and Dusty recreates Family Feud.

episodes.name: Blind Drunk
episodes.overview: To keep Karen from drinking alcohol when she's pregnant again, Randall outlaws all alcoholic beverages leaving Bullet, Robby and Delbert to become Dukes Of Hazzard. Kevin lies to Gina of having a girlfriend in Canada.

episodes.name: Blimp City
episodes.overview: Paradise PD combats the city's drone menace. Karen's mother, Agatha, moves in to help with baby prep. Kevin offers to assist Gina with her tech issues.

episodes.name: The World According to LARP
episodes.overview: Karen asks Chief to play nice with Hopson, but the task proves surprisingly humiliating. Kevin tries to get Gina into Live Action Role Playing.

episodes.name: Fetal Attraction
episodes.overview: The mutants enter stage three in their quest for revenge. Gina's family kidnaps Kevin. The Chief worries his unborn child has it in for him.

episodes.name: What Happens in Twatemala
episodes.overview: Karen bets big, hoping a new casino will raise enough money to rebuild Paradise. Kevin's relationship with Gina remains stubbornly platonic.

episodes.name: PARADISIS
episodes.overview: Gina and Kevin make a big announcement, Bullet worries Fitz is on the verge of an unpleasant discovery, and Dusty joins a "gym."

episodes.name: The Brozone Lair
episodes.overview: Excited to finally have the son he always wanted, Chief Crawford focuses on being a new father while the townspeople build a utopia - inside Dobby.

episodes.name: Diddy's Home
episodes.overview: Karen replaces everyone in town with actors to impress Elon Musk, Kevin gets an inflatable girlfriend and Dusty obsesses about impressing his father.

episodes.name: A Star is Porn
episodes.overview: Inspired by his son's interest in a kids' band, Chief Crawford decides to pursue his artistic ambition. Kevin accidentally becomes an adult film star.

episodes.name: Good Jeans
episodes.overview: A billionaire moves his company to Paradise, forcing Robby and Delbert to get jobs. Chief Crawford searches for the perfect outfit to impress Charles.

episodes.name: The Shartist
episodes.overview: When Gina returns to town, Kevin tries to prove she's a clone. Dusty becomes an art sensation and Chief Crawford falls prey to his virtual assistant.

episodes.name: The Butt Cut
episodes.overview:
To undo a family curse, Chief Crawford must cater to the whim of a witch living on the outskirts of town.

Kevin looks for dirt on Charles Lovely.

episodes.name: Boat!
episodes.overview:
Kevin tries to sneak back into Paradise to warn his friends of Charles' evil plan while they take jobs selling

Lovely Corp. products door-to-door.

episodes.name: King of the Norf
episodes.overview: The resistance plots to take down Lovely Corp. Karen mixes up her medication, causing mayhem. Chief Crawford and Fitz struggle to move Dusty's mother.

episodes.name: Sack to the Future
episodes.overview: Determined to change his life, Kevin journeys back in time to undo a childhood mistake - but meddling with the past doesn't solve his problems.

episodes.name: The Eternal Reckoning
episodes.overview:
With the town suspended in the air, everyone rallies together to defeat Charles Lovely before it's too late.

Dusty plans a family reunion.
